Uses of Package
Stratego

Classes in Stratego used by Stratego
AI
           
AIDialog
           
AIDialog.CancelHandler
          CancelHandler: If the user clicks the cancel button then the dialog will just close
AIDialog.OkHandler
          OkHandler: When user clicks the ok button the window will close and the Ai will then put all of its pieces on the game board and the game will begin.
CreateAccountDialog
           
CreateAccountDialog.CancelHandler
          CancelHandler: If the user clicks the cancel button, they will be brought back to the LoginScreen.
CreateAccountDialog.OkHandler
          OkHandler: When the user clicks the ok button the new information will be added to the data base.
GameBoard
           
GameBoard.MouseHandler
          MouseHandler: This is where the game board will interact with the mouse.
GameBoard.MouseMotionHandler
          MouseMotionHandler: This is where we will take care of dragging events.
GameBoardManager
           
GameGUI
           
GameGUI.ChangeAccountPasswordHandler
          ChangeAccountPasswordHandler: If the user chooses to, they can change the password currently associated with their account.
GameGUI.ForfeitHandler
          ForfeitHandler: If a game is currently in progress and the user chooses to, they can give up.
GameGUI.NewGameHandler
          NewGameHandler: Handles when the NewGameButton or NewGameMenuItem is pressed.
GameGUI.PlayReplayHandler
          PlayReplayHandler: If a game is currently not in progress and the user has a replay selected in the JList, then they will be able to watch the replay of the game.
GameGUI.PutPiecesRandomlyHandler
          PutPiecesRandomlyHandler: User can select this option if they wish to place the remaining pieces randomly on the board.
GameGUI.StartGameHandler
          StartGameHandler: After the user has placed all of their pieces onto the game board, The user will now have the option to start the game.
GameGUI.StopReplayHandler
          StopReplayHandler: If a replay is currently being played, the user will have the option to stop the replay.
GameGUI.WindowExitHandler
          WindowExitHandler: When the user clicks the X in the top right of the GUI to close the application, they will be asked if they relly want to quit or not.
IllegalGridDimensionException
          This class represents an error condition where someone attempts to create a grid using illegal grid dimension, which could mean negative values for the columns and rows, or where the calculated cell sizes would differ from the piece sizes to be fit inside the grid.
LoginDialog
           
LoginDialog.CreateAccountHandler
          CreateAccountHandler: When this button is pressed, the CreateAccountDialog will appear asking for a username and password.
LoginDialog.OkHandler
          OkHandler: When user clicks the ok button, the GUI will take the data and check to see if the provided account is in the data structure or not.
Move
           
Player
           
Position
           
Replay
           
StrategoGame
          This interface provides a means for an application to provide a custom response for game events triggered inside the game board manager and its panel and event handlers.
StrategoPiece
           
VSDialog
           
VSDialog.OkHandler
          OkHandler: When user clicks the ok button the window will close and the game will resume.
